column4: Aldarion]] to act as headquarters for the [[Guild of Venturers]]. It was a massive ship, designed to be more of a dwelling-place than a sailing vessel. Originally anchored off the island of [[Tol Uinen]] in the bay of [[Rómenna]], it was later moved to the ports of [[Andúnië]].<ref>{{UT
column5: Wife}}</ref>  At some later date the ship was confiscated by the Kings and all of its records (including the accurate charts of [[Númenor]]) perished in the Downfall.<ref>{{UT
